annotation.scene_description: Multiple linear and clustered warm signatures spread throughout the image. Notable contrast differences suggestive of both natural and potentially man-made objects. Sparse thermal points and elongated shapes are visible, likely indicating diverse object types and formations.

anomalies.notable_features: Cluster of linear warm signatures with moderate thermal contrast
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Thermal intensity pattern suggests multiple elongated objects, possibly logs or poles

anomalies.notable_features: Circular thermal signature with distinct warm inner core
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Shape and intensity may be indicative of a smaller clustered assembly or object, varying suggestive possibilities

anomalies.notable_features: Dense linear structures crossing over with varying thermal signatures
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Overlapping linear heat signatures suggest possible logs or other elongated items

anomalies.notable_features: Series of parallel lines with moderate thermal signatures
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Parallel arrangement and moderate thermal intensity suggest stacked logs or similar configuration
